name: Spicy Seafood Soup
author: dramafree75
summary: I fell in love with Nigerian fish pepper soup and made my own variety of fish soup using everyday foods from the local grocer.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 head bok choy, leaves and stalks separated
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Season catfish and shrimp with garlic powder, paprika, Cajun seasoning, and curry powder; set aside in a bowl
Heat a 6-quart pot over medium heat for 2 minutes; add olive oil
Add corn, bok choy, onion, bell pepper, serrano pepper, and garlic
Stir-fry until onion becomes tender, about 5 minutes
Add tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes
Pour in water and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes
Add catfish and shrimp to the soup
Cover and cook until flesh is opaque, 6 to 7 minutes more
